task_description: Integrate FRS User Profiles plugin with GreenshiftWP by syncing profile data to WordPress user meta and providing field-specific shortcodes for dynamic content

patterns.integration_pattern: Use Base trait for singleton, hook into frs_profile_saved action, check user_id before processing
patterns.shortcode_pattern: Static init() method on WordPress init, use shortcode_atts() for attributes, return HTML strings
patterns.meta_prefix: All user meta keys should use 'frs_' prefix (e.g., frs_first_name, frs_job_title)
patterns.data_access: Always use Eloquent ORM (Profile::find(), Profile::where()) - never raw SQL

existing_implementations.description: FluentCRMSync provides the template for integration classes. It already hooks into frs_profile_saved and demonstrates proper user_id checking.
